item.title: Hierarchical Uncertainty Exploration via Feedforward Posterior Trees
item.description: Visualizing high-dimensional posterior distributions is challenging. This paper introduces ‘Posterior Trees,’ a novel method using tree-structured neural network predictions for hierarchical uncertai…
